title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5800.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5800.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

These rules governing public access to certain records of the
corporation are promulgated for the purpose of implementing the provisions of
section 87 of article 6 of the Public Officers Law (which article is known as
the Freedom of Information Law and is hereinafter referred to as the
act). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5800.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
